:::{#blog-heading}

The primary author of this blog is [Greg Landrum](https://github.com/greglandrum). 

The repo with the original Jupyter notebooks and data for this blog [is here](https://github.com/greglandrum/rdkit_blog)

The hub for information about the RDKit is [rdkit.org](https://www.rdkit.org)

If you're an Anaconda Python user, installing the RDKit is as simple as `conda install -c conda-forge rdkit`

You can also install the RDKit from PyPi: `pip install rdkit-pypi`

:::
